title: Current Work
description: Projects I'm currently building and researching

items.title: L-Zero
items.description: L-Zero is an instruction set designed for AI agents to generate executable programs. Just download the runtime, feed your AI the documentation, describe what you want, and watch it build.

items.title: Neural Networks from Scratch
items.description: Implement classic neural networks from scratch without using nn.Module, to deeply understand PyTorch and model principles.

items.title: Yuxu's Game of Life
items.description: A GPU-accelerated genome-based evolution simulation where neural network organisms compete, reproduce, and evolve through natural selection and reinforcement learning.

items.title: Search Data Sync Platform
items.description: A high-performance, Event-Driven search platform featuring Change Data Capture (CDC), Zero-Code Coupling, and Distributed Tracing.

items.title: Spring-AI-RAG-System
items.description: Enterprise-grade Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline implementing hybrid search (Elasticsearch + PgVector). Solves context window limits and reduces hallucination through explainable retrieval chains.
